text: Slatina (meaning approximately "marsh, swamp, watery plain" or "salty water" in Slavic languages and in Romanian) may refer to: == In Albania == * another name for Slatine and for Sllatina == In Antarctica == * Slatina Peak == In Bosnia and Herzegovina == * Srednja Slatina, a settlement * Slatina (Foča), near to Foča * Slatina (Laktaši), In the Laktaši-municipality == In Bulgaria == * Byala Slatina, a town * Slatina, Sofia, a municipality of Sofia * other settlements, mainly the villages: ** Slatina, Montana Province ** Slatina, Plovdiv Province ** Slatina, Silistra Province ** Slatina, Lovech Province == In Croatia == * Slatina, Croatia (formerly Podravska Slatina), a town in the Virovitica-Podravina County * Kutinska Slatina, near Kutina in the Sisak- Moslavina county * Moslavačka Slatina, in the Sisak-Moslavina County * Petrova Slatina, a village near Šodolovci in the Osijek-Baranja county * Slatina Pokupska, near Glina in the Sisak-Moslavina county * Slatina Svedruška, a village near Petrovsko in the Krapina-Zagorje county == In the Czech Republic == * municipalities: ** Slatina (Kladno District) ** Slatina (Klatovy District) ** Slatina (Litoměřice District) ** Slatina (Nový Jičín District) ** Slatina (Plzeň-North District) ** Slatina (Svitavy District) ** Slatina (Ústí nad Orlicí District) ** Slatina (Znojmo District) ** Slatina nad Úpou, Náchod District ** Slatina nad Zdobnicí, Rychnov nad Kněžnou District ** Horní Slatina, Jindřichův Hradec District * parts of municipalities: ** Slatina (Brno), part of Brno ** Slatina (Chudenice), part of Chudenice ** Slatina (Františkovy Lázně), part of Františkovy Lázně ** Slatina (Horní Vltavice), part of Horní Vltavice ** Slatina (Hostouň), part of Hostouň ** Slatina (Hradec Králové), part of Hradec Králové == In Greece == * another name for Chrysi, Kastoria == In North Macedonia == * another name of Slatino == In Romania == * Slatina, Romania, the capital city of Olt County ** FC Olt Slatina, a defunct association football club ** CSM Slatina (football), an association football club ** CSM Slatina (women's handball), a club * Slatina, Suceava, a commune in Suceava County * Slatina, a village in Nucșoara Commune, Argeș County * Slatina-Nera, a village in Sasca Montană Commune, Caraș-Severin County * Slatina-Timiș, a commune in Caraș-Severin County * Slatina de Criș, a village in Dezna Commune, Arad County * Slatina de Mureș, a village in Bârzava, Arad * several small rivers: ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Sebeș in Caraș-Severin County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Bresnic in Caraș-Severin County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Putna in Vrancea County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Trebeș in Bacău County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Iza in Maramureș County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Arieșul Mic in Alba County ** Slatina, a tributary of the river Râul Doamnei in Argeș County ** Slatina (Timiș), a tributary of the river Timiș in Caraș-Severin County ** Slatina, a smaller tributary of the river Timiș in Timiș County ** Slatina (Apa Mare), a tributary of the river Apa Mare in Arad and Timiș Counties == In Serbia == * Slatina (Čačak), a village in Moravica District * Slatina (Knjaževac), a village in Zaječar District * Slatina (Loznica), a village in Mačva District * Slatina (Negotin), a village in Bor District * Slatina (Šabac), a village in Mačva District == In Slovakia == * Slatina, Levice District, a municipality in southern Slovakia * Slatina (Slovakia), a tributary of the river Hron * Slatina (Lúky), a settlement in northwestern Slovakia near Lúky * Slatina (Dohňany), a settlement in northwestern Slovakia near Dohňany * Slatina nad Bebravou, a settlement in western Slovakia near Krásna Ves == In Slovenia == * Slatina pri Ponikvi, a settlement near Ponikva * Slatina Radinci, a settlement near Radenci * Rogaška Slatina, a settlement near Rogatec == In Ukraine == * Slatina-Doly (Slatina- Selo), a settlement near the Romanian border * Solotvino (, ) == See also == * Donja Slatina (disambiguation) * Gornja Slatina (disambiguation)
title: Slatina
